de.esoco.lib.expression

Class ReflectionFuntions

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.expression.ReflectionFuntions

  • public class ReflectionFuntions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains factory methods for reflection-related methods.

      • newInstanceOf

        public static <T> Function<java.lang.Object,T> newInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<T> rClass)
        Returns a new function object that creates a new instance of a certain class. This is a shortcut method for the concatenation of the methods newInstance() and Functions.value(Object).
        Parameters:
        rClass - The class to create a new instance of
        Returns:
        A new function instance

      • newInstanceOfClass

        public static <T> Function<T,T> newInstanceOfClass()
        Returns a new function instance that will create a new instance of the class of the input object. This is a shortcut method for the concatenation of newInstance() and getObjectClass().
        Returns:
        A new function instance
